## PlayerCamera.viewModelUri property

The URI of the view model.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get viewModelUri(): string | undefined;
```

## Remarks

If not set, defaults to using attached entity's model uri. If no entity is attached, returns `undefined`<!-- -->.

\*\*Category:\*\* Players
